Class UrchinProperties | Methods
 
Packagesekati.external
Classpublic class Urchin

Google Analytics (Urchin) tracking of Flash events.


Example
Add google analytics javascript to your swf's html document:
  <script src="http://www.google-analytics.com/urchin.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
  _uacct = "UA-000000-0"; <!-- Insert your GA site account number -->
  urchinTracker();
  </script>

Enable swLiveConnect: 
flash.system.fscommand( "swLiveConnect", "true" );

Make your initial tracking call: 
Urchin.track( "home" );

See also

http://www.google.com/support/analytics/bin/answer.py?answer=27243&hl=en

Urchin
Property detail
baseproperty
base:String  [read-write]

Indicates the flash sites Urchin tracking base.

The default value is "flash".

Implementation
    public static function get base():String
    public function set base(value:String):void

Example 
    Urchin.base = "homepage"; // set optional webroot

Constructor detail
Urchin()constructor
public function Urchin()

Urchin Static Constructor

Method detail
track()method
public static function track(pg:String):void

Track a page event.

Parameters
pg:String

Example 
    Urchin.track("projects");    // register '/homepage/projects'
    Urchin.track("projects/page1");  // register '/homepage/projects/page1'
